q: why do they play music before the ball game begins
pred: The music played before the ball game begins serves as a way to create an atmosphere and set the tone for the event. It helps to pump up the crowd and create excitement for the game. The music also helps to create a sense of unity among the players and the audience, as they all share the same passion for the sport. In the video, the music is played by a band, which adds to the overall ambiance and entertainment value of the event.
